snippet: The Carolina Panthers went to Florida to prepare for their N.F.L. season opener at Tampa Bay because President Obama was supposed to speak at their stadium during the Democratic National Convention.
lead_paragraph: The Carolina Panthers went to Florida to prepare for their N.F.L. season opener at Tampa Bay because President Obama was supposed to speak at their stadium during the Democratic National Convention.

headline.seo: With Convention in Charlotte, Panthers Train Elsewhere
headline.main: Panthers Make Best of Hitch in Preparations for Their Campaign
headline.print_headline: Panthers Make the Best of a Hitch in Preparations for Their Campaign
